name: Tankshift
description:
Welcome to Tankshift! Current status: in development.

Take control of a human that somehow got sent to the tank afterlife, and blast your way out of tank hell.

Source code is linked with the files. This project aims to be a good look into some development best practices and will be cleaned up and commented properly over time - before the end of the jam, I only had time to comment a few bits 😫
